sentences.sContent: For this reason, policymakers need to be careful not to overstimulate the economy when an oil shock hits.
sentences.sContent_eng: For this reason, policymakers need to be careful not to overstimulate the economy when an oil shock hits.
sentences.sCn: 正是由于这个原因，政策制定者们需要小心谨慎，当油价冲击来临时，不要过度刺激经济。
